items.title: This Is Halloween, Everybody Make a Scene: Halloween in YA Lit
items.description: Celebrate Halloween with this array of YA novels and short stories set on or with significant events taking place on Halloween.

items.title: The Best New Books of November, According to Indie Booksellers
items.description: What better way to get book recommendations than from independent booksellers? Here are ten of their favorites of November 2025.

items.title: 7 Fun Sticker Books for All Ages
items.description: You don't have to give up the joys of stickers as an adult! These sticker books for all ages range from Animal Crossing to classic art.

items.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

items.description: Gender Queer: The Annotated Edition includes annotations from comics experts, trans cartoonists, and Maia Kobabe. Plus, more LGBTQ book news!
